#summary Build Instructions for building GeoBatch
#labels Phase-Implementation,BuildInstructions
= Build Instructions =

This page contains basic information about how to build the geobatch (former Ingestion Engine) application.


= Details =

To build the code you need Maven2 configured and installed on your machine. If you want to compile IE for using the XStream DAO run the command:

{{{
mvn clean install -Dallow.test.failure.ignore -P dao.xstream
}}}

If you want to compile IE for using the JiBX DAO run the command:
{{{
mvn clean install -Dallow.test.failure.ignore -P dao.jibx
}}}

To import the projects into Eclipse, run the command:
{{{
mvn eclipse:clean eclipse:eclipse -P dao.{xstream or jibx}
}}}
